entry.title: Israel Begins Pumping Seawater Into Hamas's Gaza Tunnels
entry.content: The effort, which is at an early stage, is part of an intensive campaign to destroy the underground infrastructure that has underpinned the militant group’s operations.

entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What We Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.

entry.title: Israel's Netanyahu Rejects U.S. Plan for Postwar Gaza
entry.content: The prime minister said he won’t allow the Palestinian Authority to take over Gaza, his sharpest comments yet against the White House plan for after the war.
